← All games

Fallout Shelter

Arcade title

Can I transfer my saves?

No Tesla→home save export. Xbox↔Windows can share via Play Anywhere; other ecosystems separate.

Where to buy/play at home

  • Green Man Gaming
  • Fanatical
  • GOG
  • Humble
  • Epic (creator code)

We only link to authorised stores. Commissions may apply.

Platforms

iOS/Android, PC, PS4, Switch, Xbox

Setup (3 steps)

pc

  1. Install free or buy DLC on an authorised PC store.
  2. Sign into the same account consistently for cloud saves (where supported).
  3. Start a new vault if migrating from Tesla.

Good to know

  • Playable without a controller on some platforms.
  • Prices vary; check each store above.
